item.title: How I side project
item.description: This post started out as a long-form response to this tweet by Raj Kunkolienkar: Question to all the side project machines that I follow (with much respect) : what framework / setup / infrastructure / tools do you use to push out ideas to MVP so quickly?@kognise @thesephist @jajoosam — Raj Kunkolienkar ðŸš€ (@kunksed) May 21, 2019 … but then, I got busy, a few weeks passed, and it took a while for me to get back to it.
